data.description: This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of next-generation wireless technologies. You will collaborate closely with our research and engineering teams to advance 3GPP, AI-RAN, and O-RAN system design for 6G and beyond. Your work will help shape applied ML solutions for network optimization and enable service-aware, beyond-connectivity use cases that push the boundaries of cellular networks. You will play a key role in implementing innovative ideas within real-world platforms such as OpenAirInterface, followed by hands-on testing and validation in the lab. Your contributions will support high-impact research outputs, including submissions to top-tier venues and patent filings that strengthen Nokiaâ€™s technology leadership.
